backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact messages by timestamp and exposing submit and query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions of each component or page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the React application with title 'Axses'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that selects a page via hash routing and renders it with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, subject support, and backend submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/download/ComingS: Neon-styled card showing Play Store coming‑soon info with notify button and release date.
frontend/src/components/features/Feature: Grid of six feature cards with icons, descriptions, and scroll‑reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryP: Placeholder grids for screenshots and videos with reveal animations and hover overlays.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with parallax background, title, tagline, CTA button, and developer info.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, social links, and copyright note with neon-styled icons.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo and hash-based navigation supporting desktop and mobile menus.
Wrapper around Button that applies a neon-button class for styling.
frontend/src/components/site/NeonCard.ts: Card component applying neon-card styling with optional hover effects.
Layout wrapper applying a site-layout class around children.
frontend/src/components/worldmap/WorldMa: Interactive grid of world locations using NeonCard and icons, highlighting cards on hover or click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identity, handling login/logout, and exposing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Returns a scroll-based offset value for creating parallax effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides mutation to submit a contact form through the backend actor and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook revealing elements when they enter the viewport.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining neon theme variables and component styles like neon buttons, cards, and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutGamePage.tsx: Renders the About page with scroll-reveal text and feature cards describing the game's world and environments.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form with social links and response-time info using a scroll-reveal effect.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPage.tsx: Shows a coming-soon download card and lists minimum and recommended system requirements.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturesPage.tsx: Presents the game's features using a FeatureCards component within a standard layout.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Provides a gallery page with placeholder images inside the main site layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the home page with a hero section and scroll-reveal feature cards highlighting world size, NPCs, and optimization.
frontend/src/pages/WorldMapPage.tsx: Displays a world map image with scroll-reveal effects and an interactive map component.
frontend/src/router/routes.ts: Defines the app's route list mapping paths to page components and labels.
frontend/src/router/useHashRouter.ts: Implements a simple hash-based router hook for navigation and route tracking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, typography, animations, and custom neon styling.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, pending requests, and metadata for the Axses frontend.
